dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5371 IH: To prohibit the use of Federal funds and the provision of technical assistance for the Heritage Partnership Program and National Heritage Areas.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds and the provision of technical assistance for the Heritage Partnership Program and National Heritage Areas.

section.header: Prohibition on Federal assistance for National Heritage Areas
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no Federal funds may be used and no Federal technical assistance may be provided for the following:
